reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Agriturismo Marcarini –This small agriturismo of 6 or so rooms, stands by itself in a vineyard owned by the prestigious Marcarini wine family outside of Neviglie and Treiso in Piemonte, about 8 km or so from Alba. I loved the pictures on the website and at 100 euros a night (because we were staying 5 nights), I couldn’t pass it up. It was a delight.
reviews.title: Marcarini Agriturismo and Elisa, both wonderful
